fulltext:
Phuc Nguyen
Senior QA engineer
Senior QA engineer with 9 years of experience in
software development process. Involved in all
phases of product life cycle: brainstorming,
design, implement, testing and deployment.
nguyen.tan.phuc@hotmail.com
0903971771
Ho Chi Minh
linkedin.com/in/phuc-nguyen-07266633
phuc.nguyen.tan
WORK EXPERIENCE
05/2014 – Present
Product owner + Senior QA engineer
Tripolis Solutions
Ho Chi Minh
https://www.tripolis.com/
Defined epics, features and user stories from
requirements for email marketing platform.
Managed product roadmap and acted as a Scrum master
in the team.
Discussed and reviewed: UI/UX design, API design and
database model.
Did testing: manual and automation (for both UI
functions and API functions).
Did deployment for new releases.
Monitored production environment.
08/2013 – 04/2014
Test analyst
SMS management and technology
Ho Chi Minh
https://www.smsmt.com
Did backlog grooming session with Agile team
Did manual testing for web application
Did automation testing by using Robot framework
07/2011 – 07/2013
Test engineer
Aricent
Ho Chi Minh
https://www.aricent.com
Worked in the lab to setup test environment: BSC and
BTS (hardware).
Tested functionalities of GSM, GSM-R and GPRS network.
Analyzed network logs to evaluate test result.
Achievements/Tasks
ACHIEVEMENTS & CERTIFICATES
ISTQB - ISEB Certified Tester Foundation Level
(CTFL) (12/2013 – Present)
EDUCATION
09/2006 – 04/2011
Electronics and Telecommunications
Engineering
Danang University of Technology
Da Nang
